description: A very warm welcome to Toronto, where we will get to explore the St. Lawrence Market, named by National Geographic as one of the finest food markets in the world. By booking our Toronto Food Tour, we will take you on a taste-bud tantalising journey with dishes inspired by the culture that shaped Toronto. Along the way, your guide will share some key points of local, as well as Canadian history.

reviews.title: Had a Blast!
text: We were fortunate to have Paris as our tour guide on our Secret Food Tour in Toronto.  Not only did he take us around for some amazing eats, but he shared all of his knowledge about the area and was just a fun and great guy to walk around with.  Definitely recommend - great way to spend part of a day.

reviews.title: Fun tour to spend the afternoon
text: Yulia was a great tour guide & very knowledgable in the buildings of the downtown area. The food stops were interesting And she added lots of hospitality and fun in our journey. The tour exposed  me to some of the interesting areas of downtown Toronto and trendy shops. A great way to spend an afternoon and I would definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Fun and tasty!
text: We had a small group of three which made it more personal and allowed for better interaction.  Carol was our guide and was very knowledgeable about the wreath and the samples offered.  She was attentive to any needs which arose during the tour. I would recommend this tour when you visit Toronto.

reviews.title: Allison was Fabulous‚Ä¶Secret Food Tour
text: The tour was fantastic‚Ä¶!!! 5/5

Our guide, Allison was super friendly and very knowledgable of the city of Toronto,The St. Lawrence Market, and the Distillery District. We had a very good variety of visitors from different countries. Would highly recommend it.
Great value for the price ..!!!‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.title: A wonderful food and history tour.
text: A wonderful food and history tour. Yulia was a great guide who took great care to make sure we all had a great experience. She was full of historical and gastronomic information which made the trip educational as well as very tasty. Don‚Äôt have much to eat before the tour or you‚Äôll be overfill by the end.

reviews.title: History, food and feasting!
text: The secret food tour Toronto was a fabulous introduction to both Toronto‚Äôs history and to its food scene, with the bonus that we didn‚Äôt need dinner - so much food! Paris was a great guide- informative, interesting and fun. Can‚Äôt recommend highly enough.

reviews.title: Explore the variety
text: Carol was knowledgeable and showed us the variety of the influence that Canadian food has from different cultures. We were very full at the end of the tour.

reviews.title: Great walking food tour.
text: I really enjoyed the walk with Carol. Both informative and personable. The market was a joy to go round and there was a discovery at every corner.

reviews.title: Toronto‚Äôs food scene is delicious!
text: Toronto has one of the best food scenes in the world.  The diversity is amazing and the hospitality of the various food vendors was outstanding. Our guide, Paris knew all the best places and even gave us suggestions for after the tour. We tried dishes that are quintessential Canadian and we also tried dishes with strong ethnic ties. Our group really enjoyed the interaction with the other guests as well as the guide.  We would highly recommend this tour to anyone who likes to eat and get a little history about Toronto as well.

reviews.title: perfect discovery activity
text: Great outting discovering Toronto through food and it's good places. Paris was great and knowledgeable host, guiding the group with humor and his insights

reviews.title: Excellent experience with Paris
text: Paris was an amazing guide through Toronto‚Äôs amazing cuisine! 10/10 would recommend this tour; it‚Äôs not a lot of walking, you get to see a lot of the city, and the food is delicious! Thanks again to Paris!

reviews.title: Awesome local food tour!
text: Great food tour. GO HUNGRY because the food samples are big! Paris, our tour guide, was super nice and very accommodating. He gave us extra time to make purchases at the locations and a little extra time to rest when needed. We were so full at the end of the tour, we boxed up our last treat and too it with us. Thanks for a great experience and providing history along the way.

reviews.title: Unexpectedly Delicious!
text: The food choices were unexpected, but uniformly tasty! Loved the ‚ÄúSecret Food!‚Äù The historical, theatrical and architectural commentary was a perfect complement to the food!

reviews.title: Very full!
text: Food stops were great, big variety.  Was definitely full afterwards.   Ends in the distillery district so was nice to walk around a bit afterwards.  Just so you know, it is about a 15 min walk back to the starting point if you want to be back to that area.

reviews.title: Great fun tour!
text: Such a lovely tour with Carol. Great information, great bites. Got to try a lot of things we wouldn't normally order. My parents and I really enjoyed.

reviews.title: Allison was awesome!
text: My husband and I had an awesome time on our food tour with Allison. She was very friendly, engaging, and knowledgeable about Toronto history as she toured us around. We both liked the food samplings, and we were quite full by the end. I highly recommend her for tours!

reviews.title: Must do Toronto Food Tour
text: One of the best food tours I‚Äôve ever been on. Come hungry! Our family of 5 (ages 15, 18 and adult) loved it so much. Still talking about the food, the sights and our amazing guide, Carol, days after. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Toronto food tour
text: The Toronto food tour was great !! Our tour guide Yulia was excellent, fun and very knowledgeable with Toronto facts . I would recommend this tour for anyone visiting Toronto !

reviews.title: Exceptional Tour!!!
text: Allison took us to the best places to get food in toronto. As she is a very kind and outgoing person, we enjoyed every second of this tour. She was a delight to hang out with and you could feel her love towards food and her city!

reviews.title: Yulia was the best
text: Yulia did an amazing job on our tour.  You can tell she has a love for history and the city and it showed.  Would do a tour with her again.

reviews.title: Toronto food walk
text: We had a great time with Yulia. She had loads of info on Toronto and all the food we got to try was very good. There was so much of it too. Everyone in the group had to take some away with them as we couldn't eat it all!

reviews.title: Funüòä
text: Julia was an amazing guide, her knowledge of Toronto history was quite something. The walking tour itself was fun, just enough walking, just enough food.

reviews.title: Yulia was an exuberant guide!
text: We enjoyed our tour with Yulia.  The tastes were good and the shared knowledge/history was welcome.
We had some difficulty understanding your English pronunciation but your energy and enthusiasm made up the difference.
This tour was somewhat different than other food tours we've been on.  We prefer secured seating at local, hard-to-get-in places.
This tour was more of a walking tour.

reviews.title: Toronto Waking Foodie Tour
text: Our foodie tour was great. Iulie was a very knowledgeable guide, explaining not only why she chose the foods we sampled but some background as to why it was an integral part of Toronto history. The tour lasted longer than we expected which was a plus; we saw parts of Toronto we probably wouldn‚Äôt have seen if we were touring on our own. We would highly recommend the Walking Food Tour for anyone wanting a enlightening perspective of Toronto.

reviews.title: Wonderful tour full of great foods and interesting facts about Toronto‚Äôs history.
text: Yulia was amazing!   Full of interesting facts about the area, the foods and the history of both.   We were full with wonderful savory and sweet foods and had a great sampling of the eclectic food options in Toronto.

reviews.title: Epicurean delight
text: Easy walk with Yulia narrating food and historical perspective in St. Lawrence market and neighborhood. She selected unique foodie spots and did a great job sharing behind-the-scenes stories of how these came to be. I would definitely recommend Yulia and the secret food tour.

reviews.title: Fun foodie tour with good guide
text: Very enjoyable tour with knowledgeable guide and lots of good food to try. St Lawrence Market was great with lots of fun stores and different kinds of food. Yulia was fun, helpful and attentive to everyone‚Äôs needs.

reviews.title: Julia is great!
text: Julia was great! Really had a great time, all of the food was very tasty. Had a great time and learned some history. I love these Secret tours!

reviews.title: Never miss a chance for a secret food tour
text: Carol was great! Very informative & interesting. Food tours are a must when visiting a new city. Our favorite must do!! Food selection was fantastic!

reviews.title: Good, but not amazing.
text: Both areas we explored were amazing. The St Lawrence food market never disappoints, and the Distillery District was beautiful. The food was good but not mind-blowing. The tour guide was kind and non remarkable, he got the job done but that was about it. I'd suggest checking out other local food tours in TO.

reviews.title: A must see for all
text: It was great to see 2 wonderful areas of Toronto. Market and distillery district. Food tour was delicious and interesting but I truly loved the distillery district. The quaint streets, the restaurants, the little shops but most of all the ambience of the area was so unique. This is a MUST see.

reviews.title: Pleasurable and informative
text: Knowledge of the history of the area and the food made this a pleasurable and informative tour. Paris was a pleasure to follow and even slowed down for me.

reviews.title: Very stimulating, diverse, and  well delivered by our guide.  I would highly recommend this tour!
text: We enjoyed the history, food, and company.  Paris was very passionate about Toronto and all the culinary delights you can explore.  We especially liked the tour and tasting around the St. Laurent Market.  So much to stimulate all your senses.  The walk towards the distillery district was interesting as we stopped many times to look at different sights, from high end furniture window shopping, to watching chefs in training.   It was so worth it.  I now have a favorite butter chicken go to place when I am in Toronto again.

reviews.title: Awesome food tour!!
text: Our tour guide Allison was fantastic! She introduced us to several delicious samples and provided a deep history of the food scene and beautiful downtown Toronto!! She also sent a list of all the sample foods we tried, plus other food places to try!! My husband and I truly enjoyed the entire tour!!

reviews.title: Toronto Food Tour with Carol was EXCELLENT!
text: We did the walking food tour with Carol this week and it was such a wonderful experience! The food was great but even better than the food was Carol sharing the history of not only the food but also the city, some of the historic building we passed and information about the surrounding area. We went with a group of my colleagues from work and I would recommend it for both business and personal groups. Carol was a great guide so would request her if possible!

reviews.title: Wonderful Tour!
text: Thank you Yulia for a wonderful tour! My favorites were the Peameal bacon sandwich and Butter chicken roti. Yulia was not only knowledgeable, but personable with all the guests. You will not leave this tour hungry! The secret dish was a pleasant surprise!

reviews.title: Delicious, Informative, and Fun
text: This walking food tour was delicious and fun! Carol was our guide and she was informative and engaging. She had many delicious stops, and we were very full at the end of the tour! She also took into account our need for a break to sit down for a bit and for washrooms. We enjoyed the local foods and visiting St. Lawrence Market.

reviews.title: St. Lawrence Market and Distillery area - a site to visit again
text: Great way to experience a prominent part of the city. Our tour guide Allison was fabulous and provided us with some very interesting history. We tried many different foods, some out of my comfort zone but I still tried it.
It may be nice to have the option to select which foods you want to try when booking (not sure as it was a gift). Overall a fantastic tour with my bestie!

reviews.title: Delicious Tour
text: Our family went on the secret food tour in Toronto with Yulia as our guide. We absolutely loved it! The food was all delicious- even those tastings that I was a little hesitant to try. My favorites were the maple salmon, the butter chicken and the butter cake. Yulia did a terrific job of explaining each food choice and its importance to the city of Toronto. She also spent a lot of time explaining the history of the city while we walked from one tasting to the next. I strongly recommend this tour and Yulia as your guide.

reviews.title: A delicious taste of Toronto!!
text: Allison was a wonderful tour guide.  She was very personable and knowledgeable about the foods we were trying out.  She even provided I retesting information about the sites we passed on our tour.  The foods were a great variety and very delicious.  We were excited to try foods we had never eaten before and she made the tour a lot of fun!!!!
